Summary: Lightning hitting metal object and it falls and then takes off in a blink of an eye.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was a beutiful lightning storm.and out of nowherelightning hit something metal above the trees it started falling in flames and out of nowhere in a blink of an eye it was gone it took of toward mguiare air force base.i think my friend was with me to. then we thought other people saw it cause we seen flashlights coming our way.then the flash lights disappeared and we smelt something like hydrulic oil.we werein the woods when this happened fishing at nehaminy creek. this is no b.s and i would like to know if we were not the only ones that seen it. iknow nothing that are gov. hasthat is that fast or quiet. and leave a light trail arcing up lighting does not do that. check when the storm was in june and that will confirm the date thank you for your time.i called my friend he said i can use his name MARK MCCUE.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Bensalem
There were no other sightings in Bensalem on or around June 10th 2008
